blocks.name: cismt
blocks.content: Declare the constant for the isometry builder.

blocks.name: df-ismt
blocks.content: Define the set of isometries between two structures. Definition 4.8 of [Schwabhauser] p. 36. See ~ isismt . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-ismt(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cismt, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cab(s2, wa(wf1o(cv(s2), cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, cv(s1))), wral(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wral(s4, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cfv(cds, cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4))), co(cv(s3), cfv(cds, cv(s0)), cv(s4)))))))))
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-ismt(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ‚ä¢ Ismt =(s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { s2 |((s2 :(Base ` s0)‚Üî(Base ` s1))‚àß ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà(Base ` s0), ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà(Base ` s0),((s2 ` s3)[(dist ` s1)](s2 ` s4))=(s3[(dist ` s0)]s4))))})
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: isismt
blocks.content: Property of being an isometry. Compare with ~ isismty . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm isismt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(c4, co(c0, cismt, c2)), wa(wf1o(c4, c5, c6), wral(s0, c5, wral(s1, c5, wceq(co(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c7, cfv(c4, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), c8, cv(s1))))))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cds, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cds, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(c4, co(c0, cismt, c2)), wa(wf1o(c4, c5, c6), wral(s0, c5, wral(s1, c5, wceq(co(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c7, cfv(c4, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), c8, cv(s1)))))))), diffsc(s0, c5))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(c4, co(c0, cismt, c2)), wa(wf1o(c4, c5, c6), wral(s0, c5, wral(s1, c5, wceq(co(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c7, cfv(c4, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), c8, cv(s1)))))))), diffsc(s1, c5))
  syl6bb(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c4, co(c0, cismt, c2)), wa(wf1o(c4, c5, c6), wral(s0, c5, wral(s1, c5, wceq(co(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c7, cfv(c4, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), c8, cv(s1)))))), wcel(c4, cab(hs0, wa(wf1o(cv(hs0), c5, c6), wral(s0, c5, wral(s1, c5, wceq(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c7, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), c8, cv(s1)))))))))
  eleq2d(c4, co(c0, cismt, c2), cab(hs0, wa(wf1o(cv(hs0), c5, c6), wral(s0, c5, wral(s1, c5, wceq(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c7, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), c8, cv(s1))))))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(co(c0, cismt, c2), cab(hs0, wa(wf1o(cv(hs0), c5, c6), wral(s0, c5, wral(s1, c5, wceq(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c7, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), c8, cv(s1)))))))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))

blocks.pretty:
thm isismt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c4 ‚àà(c0[Ismt]c2)‚Üî((c4 : c5 ‚Üî c6)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c5, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,((c4 ` s0)[c7](c4 ` s1))=(s0[c8]s1))))))
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(Base ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c8 =(dist ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(dist ` c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c4 ‚àà(c0[Ismt]c2)‚Üî((c4 : c5 ‚Üî c6)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c5, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,((c4 ` s0)[c7](c4 ` s1))=(s0[c8]s1)))))), d(s0, c5))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c4 ‚àà(c0[Ismt]c2)‚Üî((c4 : c5 ‚Üî c6)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c5, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,((c4 ` s0)[c7](c4 ` s1))=(s0[c8]s1)))))), d(s1, c5))
  syl6bb((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), c4 ‚àà(c0[Ismt]c2), ((c4 : c5 ‚Üî c6)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c5, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,((c4 ` s0)[c7](c4 ` s1))=(s0[c8]s1)))), c4 ‚àà { hs0 |((hs0 : c5 ‚Üî c6)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c5, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,((hs0 ` s0)[c7](hs0 ` s1))=(s0[c8]s1))))})
  eleq2d(c4, (c0[Ismt]c2), { hs0 |((hs0 : c5 ‚Üî c6)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c5, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,((hs0 ` s0)[c7](hs0 ` s1))=(s0[c8]s1))))}, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  syl2an(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, (c0[Ismt]c2)= { hs0 |((hs0 : c5 ‚Üî c6)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c5, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,((hs0 ` s0)[c7](hs0 ` s1))=(s0[c8]s1))))}, c0 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)

blocks.name: ismot
blocks.content: Property of being an isometry mapping to the same space. In geometry, this is also called a motion. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm ismot(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, cismt, c0)), wa(wf1o(c2, c3, c3), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wceq(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c4, cfv(c2, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cds, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  anidms(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, cismt, c0)), wa(wf1o(c2, c3, c3), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wceq(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c4, cfv(c2, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))))))

}
